(Original) Great bed and breakfast stay! After traveling through many places along the coast, this was by far our favorite and most comfortable. The bed was like sleeping on clouds. Pedro and Rita were so kind and welcoming and it was great meeting the other guests.  We booked the Suite which had so much space, a large private/connected bathroom, and beautifully decorated.  Pedro & Rita have a list of recommended restaurants and we‚Äôre kind enough to make us reservations during our stay.  My husband surfs and the proximity to Supertubos break cannot be beat. Pedro also had a lot of insight on where to surf, how to enter/exit, and other invaluable advice!  The town of Peniche is a short 5 minute drive and we visited the town Obidos which was also a short 20 minute drive.  Highly recommend and we cannot wait to return!
